divs: Sighting Detailswe were driving to tacoma from concrete washington upon entering seattle we sawwhat looked like policecar lights up in the sky, within visual range of a largecomercial aircraft. definately within setacs radar range.it came from the eastand accelerated suddenly (about 1 full second) from helicopter speed to fullthrottle jet fighter speedtoward the coast it took about 20 seconds to cover thedistance. once over the water it did a 180 and came back about half the originalflight path then did a 90 degree turn toward the south and moved out of sight.the entire time it was visible was anywhere from 1 to 6 minutes i wish i couldbe more specific but i never looked at my watch and it seemed like a long time,but i know a minute can seem like a long time when something exiting ishappening.
trends: There have been 110 other sightings in Seattle
There were no other sightings in Seattle on or around December 23rd 2000
Summary: cop car lights above seattle fast and 2, 90 degree
